about.intro.approach: I design websites and applications whose primary purpose is to meet your needs, while emphasizing clarity, performance, and good understanding of client requirements.
about.intro.fullstack: I am a Fullstack Developer, passionate about web development and creating modern applications.
about.outro: If you are looking for a motivated, available and committed developer for your project, I would be delighted to discuss with you.
about.title: About Me
about.what_i_bring.improvements: Integration, bug fixes and improvements to existing projects
about.what_i_bring.solutions: Creation of showcase websites, web applications and custom tools
about.what_i_bring.title: What I can bring you
about.why_trust_me.title: Why trust me?
about.work_style.description: As a young developer, I rely on clear communication, great rigor, and a strong desire to do well.
about.work_style.process: I take the time to fully understand your project to propose adapted, clean and maintainable solutions, while respecting agreed deadlines.
about.work_style.title: My way of working

hero.label: Hero section
hero.paragraph: I build exceptional digital experiences that bring ideas to life. Specializing in modern web technologies, I create scalable applications that solve real-world problems.
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Developer
hero.title: Hi, I'm <name>Lucas</name>
projects.0.description: Progressive migration from a monolithic backend to a microservices architecture by externalizing identity and authentication (Ory Kratos/Hydra). Implementation of auth/consent/business separation, decoupling of the application core to improve modularity, security, and scalability, and development of a consent application integrated into OAuth2/OIDC flows.
projects.0.title: Auth & Identity Migration to Ory Kratos & Hydra Solutions
projects.1.description: Contributed to the migration of an AI chatbot frontend from React to Vue 3 in a technology harmonization context. Implemented end-to-end tests to validate functional user journeys and ensure continuity and quality of the user experience after migration.
projects.1.title: AI Chatbot Frontend Migration (React → Vue 3)
projects.2.description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of a high-traffic international e-commerce backend within a critical legacy monolith, coexisting with microservices from the enterprise's ecosystem. Progressive legacy/microservices integration, operational handling of failed orders in production, continuous stability improvements, implementation of multi-country business features, developer mentoring, and refactoring of JWT validation via JWKS (OpenID Connect) with automatic key rotation management.
projects.2.title: International E-commerce Backend (Legacy & Microservices)
projects.3.description: Fullstack assignment within a digital factory specialized in B2B/B2C web and mobile solutions. Design and development of applications in collaboration with product and design teams, frontend redesign of a self-service kiosk sales funnel with a strong UX focus, backend development in Java 17 / Spring Boot, and automation of Dockerization to simplify deployments and improve maintainability.
projects.3.title: Fullstack Assignment – Digital Factory (B2B / B2C)
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work showcasing various technologies and solutions
projects.title: Missions
